corporation.translation[0].definitions[0: a big company, or a group of companies acting together as a single organization
corporation tax (=tax that companies have to pay on their profits)
He works for a large American corporation.
corporation.translation[0].definitions[1: an organization or group of organizations that work together for a particular purpose and are officially recognized as one
the New Orleans Citywide Development Corporation
corporation.translation[0].definitions[2: a group of people elected to govern a town or city
corporation.translation[1].definitions[0: a large company or group of companies acting together as a single organization
Mesa has completed its conversion from a partnership to a corporation.
corporation.translation[1].definitions[1: in Britain, a large company or a public organization
the Corporation of the City of London
